name: chumpWAR beta
description:
3D CHUMPS from our NFT collection at war!! Who will come out on top?! This is the beta version of our future fps that will come with 8 maps and multiple weapons! Every month we'll be switching the characters used in the game for different CHUMP Lords from our upcoming NFT collection! 20% of proceeds made from game sales will be given back to our NFT holders through $sol air drops! Join our discord for more information and check out our previous NFT collections on Magic Eden in the links below!

https://discord.gg/MFNMNYzwBT

https://magiceden.io/marketplace/chumps_nft

https://magiceden.io/marketplace/baby_chumps_nft
